RuntimeModule.ReleaseNotes: Release: 21 Cheat Traits Added Update 1: Fixed Localization Update 2: Unlocked Minor Faction Citizens Traits Update 3: New trait levels for increased customizability 2 new traits + bugfixes [Minor Update 3.1] Updated for 1.0.11 [Minor Update 3.2] Updated for 1.0.18 Made Sandbox traits not count towards limit Update 4: Changed Trait Count Limit to 999 Increased Population Points to 999 Added 56 Traits to add Heroes [Minor Update 4.1] Added 4 missing Hero Traits Update 5: Updated for 1.0.46 Added 4 Resource Related Traits [Minor Update 5.1] Added Hero Traits for new Hero [Minor Update 5.2] Added Hero Traits for 4 new Heroes + More trait points trait now goes upto -9999 [Minor Update 5.3] Added Hero Traits for 8 new Heroes + Fixed 2 minor faction traits getting locked [Minor Update 5.4] Fixed Hero Fluffpetal Gurk'Zva GuiElement Update 6: Updated for 1.2.18 Added Hero Traits for 5 new Heroes Allows the 5 new minor traits to be selected simultaneously Update 7: Updated for 1.3.3 Added Hero Traits for 6 new Heroes (Including upcoming Vinyl Hero) Allows the new minor trait to be selected simultaneously Adds 4 New traits
